name: 1” Curling Iron Attachment
about: What it is:A one-inch curling iron delivers bouncy, tight, and long-lasting curls..Hair Texture:Straight and Wavy.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Key Benefits:- Ceramic and nano-coated attachments offer smooth styling without frizz.What Else You Need to Know:This one-inch Curling Wand Attachment is powered by the Power Bottom Base and has four precise temperature settings and auto shutoff.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Clamp a small section of hair between the barrel and clamp arm, roll it up, and hold for a few seconds before releasing the clamp for perfectly styled bends. .. Recycling Instructions:.-Replacing an old tool? Mane and Pact Collective will recycle it for free..-Through their first-of-its-kind tool recycling program, you can now donate tools in any condition to be properly processed—diverting excess waste from landfills. .-Head to heymane.com/recycle to learn more.
